Package model

Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
model.Playlist
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrivatePlaylist, PublicPlaylist, RestrictedPlaylist
public abstract class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Playlist

      public Playlist()
      This method creates an object of the class playlist.
      pre: the package model must be imported in the class who it's going to create the object.
      post: the method will create an object.

  • Method Details

    • displayPlaylist

      public java.lang.String displayPlaylist()
      This method displays the information of the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated before.
      post the user will know the information of the playlist.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message with the information of the playlist.

    • addRate

      public void addRate​(double rate)
      This method will add the rate in a public playlist.
      pre: the method must be override and implemented in other class.
      post when the method get override it will add a rate to a public playlist.
      Parameters:
      rate - , this double will save the new rate to add.

    • getRate

      public double getRate()
      This method will get the rate of the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the user will get the rate of the playlist.
      Returns:
      double, this methods returns the rate of the playlist.

    • setName

      public void setName​(java.lang.String newName)
      This method will set a different name to the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the playlist will change it's name.
      Parameters:
      newName - , this Strings saves the new name of the playlist.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      This method will get the name of the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the user will get the name of the playlist.
      Returns:
      String, this methods returns the name of the playlist.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration​(int newDuration)
      This method will set a different duration to the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the playlist will change it's duration.
      Parameters:
      newDuration - , this int saves the new duration of the playlist.

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      This method will get the duration of the playlist in seconds.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the user will get the duration of the playlist in seconds.
      Returns:
      int, this methods returns the duration of the playlist in seconds.

    • calculateDuration

      public java.lang.String calculateDuration()
      This method calculates the duration of the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the user will know the duration of the playlist.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns the duration of the playlist with the formar minutes:seconds .

    • checkGenres

      public model.Genres[] checkGenres()
      This method check the genres in the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated.
      post: the user will know the differents genres in the playlist.
      Returns:
      Genres[], this method returns an array of the class Genre, with the differents genres that are in the playlist.

    • addSong

      public java.lang.String addSong​(Song songToAdd)
      This method add a song to the playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated before, and the song too.
      post: the user will know if the song was added, and the method will save it.
      Parameters:
      songToAdd - , this object will be added to the array with all the songs.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message to let the user know if the song was added.

    • addOwnerUser

      public java.lang.String addOwnerUser​(User newOwner)
      This method adds an owner user to the playlist. Will be override in the restricted and private playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be initializated and the user too.
      post: the method doesn't do anything yet. It will be override to let the user know if the owner user was added or not.
      Parameters:
      newOwner - , this object will be added to an array when the method gets override.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns an empty String, when it gets override will let the user know if the owner user was added or nor.
